response.overview: After being brutally murdered, 14-year-old Susie Salmon watches from heaven over her grief-stricken family -- and her killer. As she observes their daily lives, she must balance her thirst for revenge with her desire for her family to heal.
response.tagline: The story of a life and everything that came after...
response.title: The Lovely Bones

results.name: Saoirse Ronan Heartbreakingly Stands Up Her Date
Saoirse Ronan on The Lovely Bones | Film4 Interview Special
